params.chunk: - Next sequential code chunk Emits an {ChunkStored} event.
params.name: - Name given to the script. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

params.details: - Any details the owner wishes to store about the script Emits an {ScriptCreated} event.
params.name: - Name given to the script. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

params.details: - Any details the owner wishes to store about the script Emits an {ScriptDetailsUpdated} event.
params.name: - Name given to the script. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

params.isVerified: - The verification status Emits an {ScriptVerificationUpdated} event.
params.name: - Name given to the script. Eg: threejs.min.js_r148

addChunkToScript(string,bytes).notice: Add a code chunk to the script

updateScriptVerification(string,bool).notice: Update the verification status of the script

documentation.text: @notice Error for, The Script you are trying to create already exists
